title: Nadya Karpova: The Russia striker speaking out against war in Ukraine
description: Nadya Karpova is one of very few Russian sportspeople to speak out against the war in Ukraine. She does so almost every day.

title: Flight cancellations - why are there so many?
description: There has been significant disruption at UK airports, with flights cancelled and long queues at airports.

title: Australia climate crisis: Women call for action with photo petition
description: Women from across Australia will present a visual petition to MPs, calling for urgent action.

title: Relive England’s iconic Wembley win over Germany at Euro 2020
description: Relive the best action and reactions after England's iconic Euro 2020 win over Germany.

title: World Cup: Fans dance and sing as Wales finally qualify
description: Fans celebrated at the final whistle as Wales made it to their first football World Cup in 64 years.

title: Tube strike signals end of party for Londoners
description: Monday morning marks the end of the celebrations as Tube strike brings the network to a halt.

title: Cancelled flights fuel summer holiday fears
description: Travel agents say staff are dealing with calls from holidaymakers anxious about their plans.

title: British geologist jailed in Iraq after taking artefacts
description: Jim Fitton, 66, who is charged with taking 12 stones and broken pottery, is jailed for 15 years.

title: Ryanair Afrikaans test: South African fury over language quiz
description: South Africans flying on Ryanair must take a test in the Afrikaans language to prove their nationality.

title: The BBC's Chris Mason on what led to PM confidence vote
description: The BBC's political editor says there is anger amongst many Conservative MPs about Partygate.

title: England: Eddie Jones names five newcomers in training squad before Australia tour
description: England coach Eddie Jones names five newcomers in a 35-player squad that will train together before the tour to Australia in July.

title: Michaela McAreavey: Man attends police station over mocking video
description: Police confirmed a man was interviewed voluntarily in relation to the social media video.

title: Ukraine war: Another Russian general killed by Ukrainian forces - reports
description: Russian state media said Major General Roman Kutuzov was the latest commander killed in fighting.

title: Gatwick Airport apologises to disabled passenger left on plane
description: Victoria Brignell was forced to wait for an hour and a half before being assisted from the plane.

title: NBA Finals: Stephen Curry top scores as Golden State beat Boston Celtics
description: Watch Stephen Curry's best moments as his 29 points help the Golden State Warriors beat the Boston Celtics 107-88 in game two of the NBA Finals.

title: Sir Alastair Cook says Joe Root will go 'miles past' England runs record
description: Sir Alastair Cook says Joe Root will go "miles past" his record for the number of Test runs scored by an England batter.

title: Lebanon crisis: 'A father without his children, it's terrible'
description: As the economic crisis in Lebanon continues to bite, parents are struggling to support their children.

title: Ukraine war: UK to send Ukraine M270 multiple-launch rocket systems
description: A small number of cutting-edge rocket systems will be sent, despite a fresh warning from Russia.

title: The Papers: 'My heart is with you', and PM 'toxic for Tories'
description: The Queen's Jubilee tribute to the nation and a possible confidence vote in the PM lead Monday's papers.
